2 pounds chicken breast tenders,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,½ cup all-purpose flour,2 large eggs, beaten,1 ½ cups freshly grated Parmesan cheese,1 cup Italian-seasoned panko bread crumbs,1 teaspoon smoked paprika,parchment paper,4 tablespoons unsalted butter, divided, or more as needed,2 tablespoons olive oil, or more as needed,3 cloves garlic, minced,½ cup dry white wine,1 teaspoon dried Italian seasoning,½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste,2 cups heavy cream,chopped fresh parsley for garnish (Optional),,
